Description.Name: Contract for Po Tank Airdrop
Description.Details: Due to your friendship with The Free Worlds League, they have offered you a contract with one of their tank crews. Purchasing this contract will permit the one-time option to field a Po using a Tank Airdrop. After use, the contract is void and the Po can no longer be called in. THIS IS A ONE-USE CONTRACT, IT WILL BECOME UNAVAILABLE AFTER USE! Hold Shift when deploying the airdrop ability to select a specific unit from among those available!
